title: @Riot Mecha Sion Ult Honk/Laugh
body:
The pain train needs to be able to honk (a horn sound) if the laugh key is used during his ult. Please do this for us. 

CHOO CHOO Mother******!!!

replies.body:
Hey ArithianFlame! 

Thanks for the feedback! I'll pass it on and see what we can do, buuut for now he does occasionally yell 'choo choo' when he's ulting. :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rbQbvgz5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-23T18:23:39.354+0000)
>
> Hey ArithianFlame! 
> 
> Thanks for the feedback! I'll pass it on and see what we can do, buuut for now he does occasionally yell 'choo choo' when he's ulting. :3

Thanks for the consideration!
blain the train is a real pain.
Do this and I'm sold! I could totally see some kind of deep metallic train horn!
